qas.question: Which non-elected official has held the longest term as prime minister?

answers.text: Sheikh Khalifah bin Sulman Al Khalifah

qas.question: When did Khalifa first take the post of prime minister?
What country does Khalifah serve for as prime minister?

plausible_answers.text: Sheikh Khalifah bin Sulman Al Khalifah

qas.question: who is the longest serving elected prime minister?

context: <a2_0> Bahrain <a2_0/> Thủ tướng, <a0_0><b3_0> Sheikh Khalifah bin Sulman Al Khalifah <b3_0/><a0_0/> đã ở trong bài đăng từ <a1_0> 1970 <a1_0/> , làm cho anh ta là vị thủ tướng không được bầu lâu nhất.
